info.title: getMasterchainBlockSignatures example
info.description: This is an API example for getMasterchainBlockSignatures, a method to retrieve the signatures of a specific masterchain block.

parameters.name: seqno
parameters.description: The sequence number of the masterchain block

200.description: Signatures of the specified masterchain block

node_id.description: The ID of the validator node

validator_set_hash.description: The hash of the validator set

catchain_seqno.description: The sequence number in the catchain
